moves.12... Bh4+: The knight is pinned.  At this point I will win at least a rook.
moves.13. Ke2 Ng3+ 14. Kf2: This was an unexpected bonus - I get the rook for free!
moves.15. Kg1 Nf2: The bishop is still safe from that pawn.
moves.16. Qf1: Finally the g4 Bishop must be exchanged.
moves.16... Bxf3 17. Nxf3 Bg3: Now can I get away without giving up the bishop or the knight?
moves.18. Rb1 Ne4: Knight threatens one bishop and defends another.
moves.20. Kh2 Bxe3: Got one. Can I get another?
moves.21. g3: This far ahead it is time to start the exchange off.
moves.21... Nxc3 22. bxc3: Things look rather dire for the Bishop.
moves.22... Qa5: Can white defend both the pawns?
moves.25. dxc5 Bxc5: Bishop escapes.  At this point black has had enough.
